name: Upgrade button should open pricing modal admin users when the server has requested a trial before on starter plan

inline.description:
Pre-condition:
remove any existing license and subscription
Test:
  1. 1: Login with admin user
  2. 2: Verify 'Upgrade' button is visible when Channel is visited.
  3. 3: Click on the button to verify pricing modal is opened
inline.expectedResult:
On pricing modal
  1. 1: On starter pack, 'Downgrade' button should be visible and disabled
  2. 2: on professional pack, 'Upgrade' button should be visible and not disabled
  3. 3: on entriprice pack, 'Contact Sales' button should be visible and clickable
